<h3 id="X39820">X(39820) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st EXCOSINE TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (S^4-(2*SA^2+4*SW*R^2-SW^2)*S^2-2*(2*R^2-SA)*SA*SW^2)*(SB+SC)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39820) = 3*X(154)-2*X(39828) = 3*X(1853)-4*X(39816) = 3*X(10606)-4*X(39831) = 3*X(17813)-4*X(39819) = 5*X(17821)-4*X(39825) = 3*X(18405)-4*X(39818) = 5*X(19132)-4*X(39811) = 3*X(37497)-2*X(39841)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(39820) lies on these lines: {6,114}, {22,39807}, {24,39808}, {25,39817}, {64,39812}, {98,394}, {99,1181}, {115,17814}, {147,1993}, {148,11441}, {154,39828}, {155,2782}, {184,39803}, {221,39815}, {323,5984}, {511,9861}, {542,17847}, {620,37514}, {690,17838}, {1498,23698}, {1503,39813}, {1853,39816}, {2192,39822}, {2323,24469}, {2794,37498}, {3044,19357}, {3197,39821}, {5562,39832}, {5969,19149}, {6033,36747}, {6036,17811}, {6321,18451}, {6721,17825}, {6759,13175}, {10606,39831}, {11456,13172}, {12160,39846}, {12164,22552}, {13188,18445}, {13567,39804}, {14981,39839}, {15561,36752}, {15811,39809}, {17809,39805}, {17810,39806}, {17813,39819}, {17819,39823}, {17820,39824}, {17821,39825}, {17826,39829}, {17827,39830}, {17834,39857}, {18405,39818}, {19132,39811}, {19180,39814}, {19430,39826}, {19431,39827}, {36749,38743}, {37476,39834}, {37483,38741}, {37497,39841}</p>
<p>
X(39820) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (64, 39812), (13175, 6759), (17834, 39857), (39849, 155)<br>
X(39820) = {X(114), X(39810)}-harmonic conjugate of X(6)<br>
</p>
